page.title: 07Games Survey.
page.content: Our class made a survey of the games we play at breaktimes.We usually play one of twenty three games.We discovered that the majority of games only require children in order to play the game.The apparatus needed to play the other games is very simple and easy to get,mainly bats,balls and ropes.The most popular game without apparatus is playfights which are most popular in the summer because we are allowed on the grass, in winter the most popular game is 'IT'.The most popular ball game is Football,bat and ballgame is wall tennis,and rope game is skipping.Two girls turn the rope. The rest of the girls chant a rhyme and take turns at skipping.Our favourite rhyme is Cowboy Joe.In the winter we play games that warm us up.When it is hot we play on the grass.By Class Two.
